title: All My Favorite Songs 054 by Benicio Del Toro - Awesome Mixtape Volume 1
description:
Benicio Monserrate Rafael del Toro Sanchez (born February 19, 1967) is a Puerto Rican actor and producer who emerged in the 1990s as a compelling character actor with a flair for oddball roles. Del Toro has garnered critical acclaim and numerous accolades, including an Academy Award, a BAFTA Award, a Golden Globe Award, two Screen Actors Guild Awards and a Silver Bear for his portrayal of the jaded but morally upright police officer Javier Rodriguez in the film Traffic (2000). Del Toro's performance as an ex-con turned zealot in despair Jack Jordan, in Alejandro González Inarritu's 21 Grams (2003), earned him a second nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor.

 In this episode, a playlist of Del Toro's favorite music artists, as shared by him during an interview with The Nerdist's Dan Casey in Aug 2014. 

 Lineup:
 Jimi Hendrix, Bruce Springsteen, Creedence Clearwater Revival, The Clash, The Rolling Stones, The Replacements, Guns N' Roses, Barry White, John Lee Hooker, Miles Davis, Eric Clapton, Genesis, Nina Simone, Willie Colón, Danny Rivera, Los Lobos, Elvis Presley, Johnny Cash, Hank Williams, Lefty Frizzell, Charlie Parker, Morrissey
